top100.name: uBlock Origin
top100.author: Raymond Hill
top100.description: Finally, an efficient wide-spectrum content blocker. Easy on CPU and memory.

top100.name: Facebook Container
top100.author: Firefox
top100.description: Prevent Facebook from tracking you around the web. The Facebook Container extension for Firefox helps you take control and isolate your web activity from Facebook.

top100.name: To Google Translate
top100.author: Juan Escobar
top100.description: Right-click a section of text and click the Translate icon next to it to text translate or listen to it in your language.

top100.name: Search by Image
top100.author: Armin Sebastian
top100.description: A powerful reverse image search tool, with support for various search engines, such as Google, Bing, Yandex, Baidu and TinEye.

top100.name: Firefox Multi-Account Containers
top100.author: Firefox
top100.description: Firefox Multi-Account Containers lets you keep parts of your online life separated into color-coded tabs. Cookies are separated by container, allowing you to use the web with multiple accounts and integrate Mozilla VPN for an extra layer of privacy.

top100.name: Video Background Play Fix
top100.author: JanH
top100.description: Some sites may not work with Firefox for Android video background play feature. This add-on provides a quick fix by blocking the Page Visibility API and the Fullscreen API.

top100.name: Cookie AutoDelete
top100.author: CAD Team
top100.description: Control your cookies! This WebExtension is inspired by Self Destructing Cookies. When a tab closes, any cookies not being used are automatically deleted. Keep the ones you trust (forever/until restart) while deleting the rest. Containers Supported

top100.name: React Developer Tools
top100.author: React
top100.description: React Developer Tools is a tool that allows you to inspect a React tree, including the component hierarchy, props, state, and more. To get started, just open the Firefox devtools and switch to the "‚öõÔ∏è Components" or "‚öõÔ∏è Profiler" tab.

top100.name: YouTube NonStop
top100.author: lawfx
top100.description:
Tired of getting that "Video paused. Continue watching?" confirmation dialog?
This extension autoclicks it, so you can listen to your favorite music uninterrupted.

Working on YouTube and YouTube Music!

top100.name: 'Improve YouTube!'  üéß (For YouTube & Video)
top100.author: code-for-charity
top100.description: Youtube Extension. Powerful but lightweight. Enrich your Youtube and content selection. Make YouTube tidy and smart! (Layout, Filters, Shortcuts, Playlist)

top100.name: Authenticator
top100.author: mymindstorm
top100.description: Authenticator generates 2-Step Verification codes in your browser.

top100.name: Google Search Fixer
top100.author: Thomas Wisniewski
top100.description: Override the user-agent string presented to Google Search pages to receive the search experience shown to Chrome.
